text: Camp Douglas can refer to a location in the United States: * Camp Douglas, Wisconsin, a village * Camp Douglas (Chicago), a Union POW camp during the American Civil War * Camp Douglas (Wyoming), a US POW camp during World War II * Camp Douglas (Fort Douglas, Utah), a U.S. Army post along the Oregon Trail in Utah Camp Douglas can refer to a farmstead in Spitsbergen: * Camp Douglas, Spitsbergen, a former mining encampment Campdouglas can refer to a location in Balmaghie, Scotland
title: Camp Douglas
